page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content:
The area of the study is mainly non-residential.The {Itchen Navigation {and the Itchen River}run in a North - South direction through the grid.
To the West of the block lies the residential area of {Chandler's Ford which has a large number of new housing estates.
Much of the area is open farmland , through which the {A33 Southampton to {London Trunk Road runs,}as does the Eastleigh to London Railway line.
The Northern part of the grid includes the village of {Otterbourne;}Where an extensive development of housing is planned.
